elements.text:
You are meeting with your boss. To make it on-time, you just walked up two flights of stairs quickly, and feel your heart beating very rapidly.

Here are some thoughts that might pop into mind:

texts: I want to think about how this could be the sign of an underlying condition, but it's probably just from the stairs.
That was an impressive mini workout!
I think about my heartbeat, and decide that is normal for how fast I was just going.
I am happy to be on time.
